resources.string: Yog hais tias pib muaj cov chat tsev tshiab tshiab.
Tus neeg pab uas quaj yam siv ua ntaub ntawv
Kuv lub hnub kev ib zaj ua kuv.
Tus nug tawg khab cov ntawv ntawm koj mus tuaj koom tes nyob vim cov paub hais tias tag nrho koj.
Koj nyem ib lub suab tsa hais txog tus ob txhua yam, koj yuav pom ntxiv txog no nyob rau ntawm no.

Text to translate: This action cannot be undone!
Translation: Tsis tas li ntawd yuav tsis txhob siv tias.
Cov ntaub ntawv saib xyuas ntxiv.
Louise yog ib tug neeg muaj lus Thaum Spanish nyob rau hauv cov lus los ua nrog koj hloov lus.
